name: Cetoddle
flavorText: This species left the ocean and began living on land a very long time ago. It seems to be closely related to Wailmer.

previous.name: Flamigo
previous.flavorText: This Pokémon apparently ties the base of its neck into a knot so that energy stored in its belly does not escape from its beak.

next.name: Cetitan
next.flavorText: This Pokémon wanders around snowy, icy areas. It protects its body with powerful muscles and a thick layer of fat under its skin.
